title: What champion do you recommend i learn
body: I like playing Rammus{{champion:33}}  because he is really tanky and deals a lot of damage. I'm just wondering if there are any other champions like him and that aren't ranged. Thank you

replies.body:
If you are looking for similar champs to Rammus I wouldn't necessarily Jump to Lee Sin. His play-style relies a lot more on mechanical mastery than Rammus, so it may be hard to adapt to. However, Champions like {{champion:223}} {{champion:106}} {{champion:36}} function very similarly and have High DPS for a tank champion. Build paths can be very similar too (along with runes/masteries!) 

{{champion:154}} is another champ I'd recommend learning. He's a tank that's versatile enough to fit some good damage builds when snowballing. Also ridiculously fun!

I'm assuming you are playing jungle? In my opinion Lee sin is the best champion ever to learn, he teaches you a bit of everything skill shots/decision making etc. and can be really strong in the right hands, he also never gets boring in my opinion because he is a champion that has endless possiblity

Nautilus is good, same with Malphite, Zac and Shen.

Shen becomes virtually unkillable if u can lane properly.

{{champion:111}} . So tanky, so much cc, can do lots of damage without giving away too much tankiness with a ROA in his build.

Check out some general [Naut builds here](http://probuilds.net/champions/details/Nautilus) or [here](http://www.mobafire.com/league-of-legends/champion/nautilus-93).

He is also a super great choice because you can play him top, mid, support and jungle and destroy people no matter what :D

Good luck, have fun ♥
